mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ENUM_VALUE ( F_OWNER_ENUM_ID, F_VALUE_ID, F_CODE, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ ownerEnumId }, #{ valueId }, #{ code }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ENUM_VALUE SET F_CODE = #{ code }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId } AND F_VALUE_ID = #{ valueId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID AS "ownerEnumId", T1.F_VALUE_ID AS "valueId", T1.F_CODE AS "code", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_VALUE_ID AS "_title", T2.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_ENUM_VALUE T1 LEFT JOIN T_ENUM T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = T2.F_ENUM_ID WHERE T1.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId } AND T1.F_VALUE_ID = #{ valueId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_ENUM_VALUE T1

SELECT T1.F_ENUM_ID AS "enumId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_ENUM_NAME AS "enumName", T1.F_ENCODE_STRING AS "encodeString", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_ENUM T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId }
